alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 6:58PM CST until March 04 at 4:22AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Kaufman, Rockwall and Hunt Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 15.7 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.5 feet Wednesday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
